summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the 2008 Adopted Budget, including the 2008- 2013 Capital Improvement Program (CIP) and the Position List; changing appropriations to various departments and budget control levels, and from various funds in the Budget; establishing new appropriations; making cash transfers between various City funds; abrogating a position; and revising allocations in the 2008-2013 CIP for purposes of Ordinance 122560; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
